procedure: 1. Prepare the dough by mixing flour and water until smooth. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. In a bowl, mix paneer, onion, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, black pepper, and salt.
3. Roll out small discs from the dough, add filling, and seal the edges.
4. Steam the momos for 10-12 minutes until cooked.
5. Serve hot with dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Mushroom Momos
recipes.description: Delicious dumplings filled with sautéed mushrooms and aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Prepare the dough by mixing flour and water until smooth. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. Sauté garlic, ginger, onion, and mushrooms in a pan. Add soy sauce, black pepper, and salt.
3. Roll out small discs from the dough, add filling, and seal the edges.
4. Steam the momos for 10-12 minutes.
5. Serve hot with tomato chutney.

recipes.title: Corn & Cheese Momos
recipes.description: Creamy and cheesy corn-filled dumplings, a fusion delight.
ingredients: 1/2 cup sweet corn, boiled and mashed
procedure: 1. Prepare the dough by mixing flour and water until smooth. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. In a bowl, mix sweet corn, cheese, onion, garlic, black pepper, and salt.
3. Roll out small discs from the dough, add filling, and seal the edges.
4. Steam the momos for 10-12 minutes.
5. Serve hot with spicy mayo dip.

recipes.title: Spinach & Cheese Momos
recipes.description: Nutritious dumplings with a delicious spinach and cheese filling.
procedure: 1. Prepare the dough by mixing flour and water until smooth. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. In a bowl, mix spinach, cheese, onion, garlic, black pepper, and salt.
3. Roll out small discs from the dough, add filling, and seal the edges.
4. Steam the momos for 10-12 minutes.
5. Serve hot with garlic chutney.

recipes.title: Schezwan Momos
recipes.description: Spicy dumplings filled with vegetables or chicken, tossed in Schezwan sauce.
procedure: 1. Mix flour with water and salt to form a dough; let it rest for 20 minutes.
2. Sauté vegetables with ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, and Schezwan sauce.
3. Roll out small circles of dough, fill with stuffing, and shape into momos.
4. Steam for 10-12 minutes, then toss in Schezwan sauce before serving.

recipes.title: Tandoori Momos
recipes.description: Momos marinated in spiced yogurt and grilled for a smoky flavor.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped mixed vegetables or chicken
procedure: 1. Prepare momo dough and stuffing with vegetables or chicken.
2. Steam the momos for 10-12 minutes.
3. Mix hung curd with spices and coat the momos in the marinade.
4. Grill or bake until golden and slightly charred, then serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Momos
recipes.description: Sweet dumplings filled with melted chocolate and nuts.
procedure: 1. Prepare dough using flour and water, let it rest.
2. Mix melted chocolate with nuts, powdered sugar, and cinnamon.
3. Roll out dough circles, fill with chocolate mixture, and seal into momos.
4. Steam for 8-10 minutes, brush with butter, and serve warm.

recipes.title: Chicken Momos
recipes.description: Juicy dumplings filled with spiced minced chicken, served with dipping sauce.
procedure: 1. Prepare a soft dough using flour and water, let it rest.
2. Mix minced chicken with onions, soy sauce, black pepper, and salt.
3. Roll out dough circles, fill with chicken mixture, and shape into momos.
4. Steam for 12-15 minutes and serve hot with sauce.

recipes.title: Spicy Chicken Momos
recipes.description: Momos stuffed with spicy chicken filling, tossed in a fiery sauce.
procedure: 1. Prepare momo dough and let it rest for 20 minutes.
2. Mix minced chicken with onions, soy sauce, black pepper, and chili sauce.
3. Roll out dough circles, fill with spicy chicken mixture, and seal.
4. Steam for 12-15 minutes, then toss in chili sauce and vinegar before serving.

recipes.title: Mutton Momos
recipes.description: Steamed dumplings filled with flavorful minced mutton and spices.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt to make a smooth dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. Prepare the filling by mixing minced mutton, onions, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, black pepper, and coriander.
3. Roll out small circles of dough and place filling in the center.
4. Fold and seal the edges, then steam for 15-20 minutes.
5. Serve hot with chutney or dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Prawn Momos
recipes.description: Delicate dumplings filled with juicy prawns and aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt to make a smooth dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. Prepare the filling by mixing chopped prawns, onions, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, black pepper, and coriander.
3. Roll out small circles of dough and place filling in the center.
4. Fold and seal the edges, then steam for 15-20 minutes.
5. Serve hot with chutney or dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Keema Momos
recipes.description: Delicious dumplings stuffed with spiced minced meat, a perfect street food snack.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt to make a smooth dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. Prepare the filling by mixing minced meat, onions, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, black pepper, and coriander.
3. Roll out small circles of dough and place filling in the center.
4. Fold and seal the edges, then steam for 15-20 minutes.
5. Serve hot with chutney or dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Fried Momos
recipes.description: Crispy golden-brown dumplings with a juicy meat filling inside.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt to make a smooth dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. Prepare the filling by mixing minced meat or vegetables, onions, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, black pepper, and coriander.
3. Roll out small circles of dough and place filling in the center.
4. Fold and seal the edges, then deep-fry in hot oil until golden brown.
5. Serve hot with spicy chutney or dipping sauce.

recipes.title: Soup Momos (Thukpa Momos)
recipes.description: A comforting soup with dumplings served in a spicy broth.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, water, and salt to make a smooth dough. Let it rest for 30 minutes.
2. Prepare the filling by mixing minced chicken or vegetables, onions, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, black pepper, and coriander.
3. Roll out small circles of dough and place filling in the center.
4. Fold and seal the edges, then steam for 15-20 minutes.
5. In a pot, heat oil and sauté chopped carrots, cabbage, and onions.
6. Add chicken or vegetable broth, chili sauce, and soy sauce. Let it simmer for 10 minutes.
7. Add the steamed momos to the broth and simmer for 5 more minutes.
8. Serve hot garnished with coriander.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken Momos
recipes.description: Juicy dumplings stuffed with chicken and coated in creamy butter chicken gravy.
procedure: 1. Mix flour and water to make a smooth dough and rest for 20 minutes.
2. Prepare chicken filling with ginger-garlic paste, salt, and pepper.
3. Roll out dough, fill with chicken, and shape into momos.
4. Steam momos for 10-12 minutes until cooked.
5. Toss steamed momos in butter chicken gravy and serve hot.

recipes.title: Malai Momos
recipes.description: Creamy and rich dumplings coated with a luscious malai sauce.
procedure: 1. Make a dough with flour and water and let it rest for 20 minutes.
2. Prepare filling with minced paneer or chicken, salt, and pepper.
3. Shape and steam the momos for 10-12 minutes.
4. Cook fresh cream with butter and cardamom powder to make malai sauce.
5. Toss steamed momos in the sauce and serve warm.

recipes.title: BBQ Momos
recipes.description: Smoky and flavorful dumplings coated with a tangy BBQ sauce.
procedure: 1. Prepare the dough with flour and water and let it rest.
2. Mix filling ingredients and stuff into small momo wrappers.
3. Steam the momos for 12 minutes until fully cooked.
4. Sauté momos in BBQ sauce for a smoky flavor and serve hot.

recipes.title: Peri Peri Momos
recipes.description: Spicy dumplings tossed in a fiery peri peri sauce.
procedure: 1. Prepare a smooth dough and let it rest for 20 minutes.
2. Fill and shape the momos with your chosen filling.
3. Steam for 10-12 minutes until cooked through.
4. Sauté in peri peri sauce for a bold, spicy flavor and serve hot.

recipes.title: Cheese Burst Momos
recipes.description: Gooey and cheesy momos with a molten cheese center.
procedure: 1. Knead flour with water to make a smooth dough and let it rest.
2. Fill with shredded mozzarella cheese, salt, pepper, and oregano.
3. Shape and steam for 10-12 minutes until soft.
4. Lightly pan-fry with butter for extra crispiness and serve hot.

recipes.title: Classic Mojito
recipes.description: A refreshing Cuban cocktail made with lime, mint, sugar, and soda.
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lime wedges, and sugar in a glass.
2. Add crushed ice and white rum (if using).
3. Top with soda water and stir gently.
4. Garnish with mint leaves and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Strawberry Mojito
recipes.description: A fruity twist on the classic mojito with fresh strawberries.
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lime wedges, strawberries, and sugar in a glass.
2. Add crushed ice and white rum (if using).
3. Top with soda water and stir gently.
4. Garnish with mint leaves and strawberry slices.

recipes.title: Mango Mojito
recipes.description: A tropical mango-infused mojito with a perfect balance of sweetness and freshness.
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lime wedges, and sugar in a glass.
2. Add mango puree and mix well.
3. Add crushed ice and white rum (if using).
4. Top with soda water, stir gently, and garnish with mint leaves.

recipes.title: Pineapple Mojito
recipes.description: A tropical mojito variation with fresh pineapple and mint.
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lime wedges, pineapple chunks, and sugar in a glass.
2. Add crushed ice and white rum (if using).
3. Top with soda water, stir gently, and garnish with mint leaves.

recipes.title: Watermelon Mojito
recipes.description: A hydrating mojito with the sweetness of watermelon and refreshing mint.
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves, lime wedges, watermelon chunks, and sugar in a glass.
2. Add crushed ice and white rum (if using).
3. Top with soda water, stir gently, and garnish with mint leaves.

recipes.title: Blueberry Mojito
recipes.description: A refreshing cocktail with blueberries, mint, lime, and soda.
procedure: 1. Muddle blueberries, mint leaves, and lime juice in a glass.
2. Add simple syrup and ice cubes.
3. Pour in club soda and rum (if using).
4. Stir well and garnish with extra blueberries and mint leaves.

recipes.title: Coconut Mojito
recipes.description: A tropical twist on the classic mojito with coconut and mint.
procedure: 1. Muddle mint leaves and lime juice in a glass.
2. Add simple syrup, coconut water, and ice cubes.
3. Pour in club soda and rum (if using).
4. Stir well and garnish with coconut flakes and mint leaves.

recipes.title: Passion Fruit Mojito
recipes.description: A vibrant mojito infused with fresh passion fruit and mint.
procedure: 1. Muddle passion fruit pulp, mint leaves, and lime juice in a glass.
2. Add simple syrup and ice cubes.
3. Pour in club soda and rum (if using).
4. Stir well and garnish with extra passion fruit seeds and mint leaves.

recipes.title: Cucumber Mojito
recipes.description: A cooling mojito featuring fresh cucumber and mint.
procedure: 1. Muddle cucumber slices, mint leaves, and lime juice in a glass.
2. Add simple syrup and ice cubes.
3. Pour in club soda and rum (if using).
4. Stir well and garnish with cucumber slices and mint leaves.

recipes.title: Ginger Mojito
recipes.description: A zesty mojito infused with fresh ginger and mint.
procedure: 1. Muddle grated ginger, mint leaves, and lime juice in a glass.
2. Add simple syrup and ice cubes.
3. Pour in club soda and rum (if using).
4. Stir well and garnish with ginger slices and mint leaves.

recipes.title: Paneer Noodles
recipes.description: Delicious stir-fried noodles tossed with crispy paneer and vegetables in flavorful sauces.
procedure: 1. Boil noodles as per instructions, drain, and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté ginger-garlic paste, onions, bell peppers, and carrots.
3. Add paneer cubes and stir-fry until slightly golden.
4. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
5. Toss in boiled noodles and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Mushroom Noodles
recipes.description: Flavorful noodles cooked with sautéed mushrooms and mixed vegetables.
procedure: 1. Boil noodles as per instructions, drain, and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté ginger-garlic paste, onions, bell peppers, and carrots.
3. Add sliced mushrooms and stir-fry until tender.
4. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
5. Toss in boiled noodles and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodles
recipes.description: Savory chicken noodles stir-fried with fresh vegetables and soy-based sauces.
procedure: 1. Boil noodles as per instructions, drain, and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté ginger-garlic paste, onions, bell peppers, and carrots.
3. Add chicken slices and stir-fry until fully cooked.
4. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
5. Toss in boiled noodles and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Veg Noodles
recipes.description: A simple and delicious stir-fried noodle dish packed with mixed vegetables.
procedure: 1. Boil noodles as per instructions, drain, and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté ginger-garlic paste, onions, bell peppers, carrots, and cabbage.
3. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
4. Toss in boiled noodles and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Egg Noodles
recipes.description: A flavorful noodle dish with scrambled eggs and vegetables, tossed in soy-based sauces.
procedure: 1. Boil noodles as per instructions, drain, and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan and scramble the eggs, then set aside.
3. In the same pan, sauté ginger-garlic paste, onions, bell peppers, and carrots.
4. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, salt, and black pepper.
5. Toss in boiled noodles and scrambled eggs, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes before serving.

recipes.title: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes made with simple ingredients, perfect for breakfast or brunch.
ingredients: Maple syrup and fresh fruits for serving
procedure: 1. In a bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
2. In another bowl, mix the milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
3. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
4. Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat and lightly grease with butter or oil.
5. Pour small amounts of batter onto the pan to form pancakes.
6. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
7. Serve warm with maple syrup and fresh fruits.

recipes.title: Chocolate Pancakes
recipes.description: Rich and chocolatey pancakes for a decadent breakfast treat.
ingredients: Chocolate syrup and chocolate chips for topping
procedure: 1. Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
2. In another bowl, mix milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
3. Combine the wet and dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and grease with butter.
5. Pour batter onto the pan and cook until bubbles appear.
6. Flip and cook until done.
7. Serve with chocolate syrup and chocolate chips.

recipes.title: Banana Pancakes
recipes.description: Soft and naturally sweet pancakes made with ripe bananas.
ingredients: Honey or maple syrup for serving
procedure: 1. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl.
2. In another bowl, whisk mashed banana, milk, egg, and vanilla extract.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and grease with butter.
5. Pour batter onto the pan and cook until golden brown.
6. Flip and cook the other side.
7. Serve warm with honey or maple syrup.

recipes.title: Blueberry Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes loaded with fresh blueberries for a fruity twist.
ingredients: Honey or maple syrup for serving
procedure: 1. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
2. In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
3. Fold in the blueberries and mix gently.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and grease with butter.
5. Pour batter onto the pan and cook until golden brown.
6. Flip and cook the other side.
7. Serve warm with honey or maple syrup.

recipes.title: Oatmeal Pancakes
recipes.description: Nutritious pancakes made with oats, perfect for a healthy breakfast.
ingredients: Honey or Greek yogurt for serving
procedure: 1. Blend oats into a fine flour consistency.
2. Mix with flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt.
3. In another bowl, mix milk, egg, and vanilla extract.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
5. Heat a non-stick pan and grease with butter.
6. Pour batter onto the pan and cook until golden brown.
7. Flip and cook the other side.
8. Serve with honey or Greek yogurt.

recipes.title: Classic American Pancakes
recipes.description: Light, fluffy pancakes with a buttery golden crust, perfect for a traditional breakfast.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
2. In another bowl, whisk buttermilk, egg, vanilla extract, and melted butter.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
4. Heat a non-stick pan and grease with butter.
5. Pour batter onto the pan and cook until bubbles form.
6. Flip and cook until golden brown.
7. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

recipes.title: Banana wallnut pancake
recipes.description: Soft and fluffy pancakes infused with banana and crunchy walnuts.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt.
2. In another bowl, mix milk, mashed banana, egg, vanilla, and melted butter.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
4. Fold in chopped walnuts.
5. Heat a pan, grease with butter, and cook pancakes until golden brown.
6. Flip and cook the other side.
7. Serve with honey.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes with a warm pumpkin and spice flavour, perfect for fall mornings.
ingredients: Whipped cream or syrup for serving
procedure: 1. Mix flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
2. In another bowl, mix milk, pumpkin puree, egg, vanilla extract, and melted butter.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
4. Heat a pan, grease with butter, and cook pancakes until golden brown.
5. Flip and cook the other side.
6. Serve with whipped cream or syrup.

recipes.title: Red Velvet Pancakes
recipes.description: Rich and velvety pancakes with a hint of cocoa and topped with cream cheese glaze.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
2. In another bowl, mix buttermilk, egg, vanilla, food colouring, and melted butter.
3. Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
4. Heat a pan, grease with butter, and cook pancakes until golden brown.
5. Flip and cook the other side.
6. Serve with cream cheese glaze.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
procedure: 1. Preheat the oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Roll out the pizza dough and spread the tomato sauce evenly.
3. Add fresh mozzarella pieces and drizzle olive oil on top.
4. Bake for 10-12 minutes until crispy and golden brown.
5. Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve hot.

recipes.title: Pepperoni Pizza
recipes.description: A popular American pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and spicy pepperoni slices.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the rolled-out pizza dough.
3. Add shredded mozzarella and top with pepperoni slices.
4. Bake for 10-12 minutes until crispy and golden brown.
5. Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
recipes.description: A smoky and tangy pizza with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, and red onions.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread BBQ sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add shredded chicken, mozzarella, and sliced red onions.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until crispy and golden brown.
5. Serve hot with additional BBQ sauce if desired.

recipes.title: Veggie Supreme Pizza
recipes.description: A delightful vegetarian pizza loaded with colourful vegetables and cheese.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add shredded mozzarella and vegetables.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.
5. Serve hot with a drizzle of olive oil.

recipes.title: Hawaiian Pizza
recipes.description: A sweet and savoury pizza topped with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add mozzarella, ham, and pineapple chunks.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Truffle Mushroom Pizza
recipes.description: A gourmet pizza with earthy truffle oil, mushrooms, and mozzarella.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread white sauce on the rolled-out pizza dough.
3. Add mushrooms and shredded mozzarella.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
5. Drizzle with truffle oil before serving.

recipes.title: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
recipes.description: A spicy and tangy pizza with buffalo sauce, chicken, and blue cheese.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread buffalo sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add shredded chicken, mozzarella, and blue cheese.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until crispy.
5. Serve hot with extra buffalo sauce.

recipes.title: Pesto Pizza
recipes.description: A fresh and aromatic pizza with pesto sauce, mozzarella, and cherry tomatoes.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread pesto sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add shredded mozzarella and cherry tomatoes.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until crispy.
5. Drizzle with olive oil before serving.

recipes.title: Meat Lovers Pizza
recipes.description: A hearty pizza loaded with sausage, bacon, pepperoni, and ham.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
5. Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.title: Tandoori Paneer Pizza
recipes.description: An Indian-inspired pizza with spicy tandoori paneer and vegetables.
ingredients: 150g paneer (cubed and marinated in tandoori spices)
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add tandoori paneer, mozzarella, and vegetables.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until crispy.
5. Serve hot with mint chutney.

recipes.title: Mexican Taco Pizza
recipes.description: A fusion pizza topped with seasoned ground beef, salsa, and cheese.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread salsa sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add cooked beef and cheddar cheese.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
5. Top with lettuce, tomatoes, and sour cream before serving.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi Pizza
recipes.description: A seafood-inspired pizza with garlic butter shrimp and fresh herbs.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread white sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add cooked shrimp and mozzarella.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until cheese melts.
5. Garnish with parsley and serve.

recipes.title: Greek Pizza
recipes.description: A Mediterranean-style pizza with olives, feta, and spinach.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add feta, olives, spinach, and onions.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until crispy.
5. Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

recipes.title: White Garlic Pizza
recipes.description: A creamy, garlicky pizza with a rich white sauce and herbs.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread white sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add mozzarella and garlic.
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.
5. Garnish with parsley and serve.

recipes.title: Prosciutto Arugula Pizza
recipes.description: A light Italian pizza topped with prosciutto and fresh arugula.
procedure: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (428°F).
2. Spread tomato sauce on the pizza dough.
3. Add mozzarella and bake for 12-15 minutes.
4. Top with prosciutto and arugula.
5. Drizzle with balsamic glaze and serve.

recipes.title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: A creamy and delicious smoothie made with fresh strawberries and bananas.
procedure: 1. Add banana, strawberries, milk, yogurt, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Pour into a glass and serve chilled.

recipes.title: Mango Smoothie
recipes.description: A tropical mango smoothie with yogurt and honey.
procedure: 1. Add chopped mango, yogurt, milk, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Blueberry Smoothie
recipes.description: A nutritious blueberry smoothie with almond milk and chia seeds.
procedure: 1. Add blueberries, banana, almond milk, chia seeds, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: A rich chocolate banana smoothie with cocoa powder.
procedure: 1. Add banana, milk, cocoa powder, peanut butter, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Green Detox Smoothie
recipes.description: A healthy green smoothie with spinach, banana, and apple.
procedure: 1. Add spinach, banana, apple, and coconut water to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Oat Smoothie
recipes.description: A protein-packed smoothie with peanut butter and oats.
procedure: 1. Add banana, peanut butter, oats, milk, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Pineapple Coconut Smoothie
recipes.description: A tropical smoothie with pineapple and coconut milk.
procedure: 1. Add pineapple chunks, coconut milk, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Avocado Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: A creamy and nutritious smoothie with avocado and banana.
procedure: 1. Add avocado, banana, milk, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and creamy.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Apple Cinnamon Smoothie
recipes.description: A delicious apple smoothie with a touch of cinnamon.
procedure: 1. Add chopped apple, yogurt, milk, cinnamon powder, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Orange Carrot Smoothie
recipes.description: A refreshing smoothie with oranges and carrots.
procedure: 1. Add orange segments, carrot juice, yogurt, and honey to a blender.
2. Blend until smooth and well combined.
3. Add ice cubes and blend again.
4. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Paneer Tikka
recipes.description: Grilled paneer cubes marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture.
procedure: 1. Mix yogurt, spices, lemon juice, gram flour, and salt to make the marinade.
2. Coat paneer cubes in the marinade and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
3. Skewer the paneer and grill until golden brown.
4. Serve hot with mint chutney.

recipes.title: Hara Bhara Kabab
recipes.description: Healthy spinach and green pea patties with spices.
procedure: 1. Blend spinach and green peas into a coarse paste.
2. Mix with mashed potato, spices, and cornflour.
3. Shape into patties and shallow fry until golden brown.
4. Serve hot with green chutney.

recipes.title: Crispy Corn
recipes.description: Crispy fried corn kernels with spices.
procedure: 1. Coat corn kernels with cornflour and deep fry until crispy.
2. Sprinkle black pepper, chaat masala, and salt.
3. Drizzle lemon juice before serving.
4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.description: Mushrooms stuffed with a cheesy and spiced filling.
procedure: 1. Remove mushroom stems and mix them with cheese, onions, and spices.
2. Stuff the mushrooms with the mixture.
3. Bake at 180°C for 10-15 minutes until cheese melts.
4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Spring Rolls
recipes.description: Crispy spring rolls stuffed with vegetables.
procedure: 1. Sauté vegetables with salt and black pepper.
2. Fill spring roll sheets with the mixture and roll tightly.
3. Deep fry until golden brown.
4. Serve with chili sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka
recipes.description: Grilled chicken chunks marinated in yogurt and spices.
procedure: 1. Mix yogurt, spices, lemon juice, and salt for the marinade.
2. Marinate chicken for 1 hour.
3. Grill until cooked and charred.
4. Serve hot with mint chutney.

recipes.title: Fish Fingers
recipes.description: Crispy fried fish fingers coated in breadcrumbs.
procedure: 1. Season fish fillets with salt and pepper.
2. Dip in beaten egg, then coat with breadcrumbs.
3. Deep fry until golden brown.
4. Serve hot with tartar sauce.

recipes.title: Mutton Seekh Kebab
recipes.description: Juicy minced mutton kebabs with aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Mix all ingredients and shape into kebabs.
2. Grill or pan-fry until cooked through.
3. Serve hot with mint chutney.

recipes.title: Prawn Tempura
recipes.description: Crispy battered prawns deep-fried to perfection.
procedure: 1. Mix flour, cornstarch, salt, and black pepper in a bowl.
2. Gradually add soda water to make a light batter.
3. Dip prawns in the batter and deep fry until golden brown.
4. Serve hot with soy sauce or spicy mayo.

recipes.title: Chicken Lollipop
recipes.description: Spicy and crispy chicken lollipops with a flavorful coating.
procedure: 1. Marinate chicken drumettes with spices, soy sauce, and ginger-garlic paste for 30 minutes.
2. Mix flour and cornflour in a separate bowl.
3. Coat marinated chicken in the flour mixture and deep fry until crispy.
4. Serve hot with schezwan sauce.

recipes.title: Masala Chai
recipes.description: A traditional Indian spiced tea with milk and aromatic spices.
procedure: 1. Boil water with ginger, cardamom, cinnamon, cloves, and black pepper for 5 minutes.
2. Add black tea leaves and simmer for 2 minutes.
3. Pour in milk and bring to a boil.
4. Strain and serve hot with sugar if desired.

recipes.title: Green Tea
recipes.description: A light and refreshing tea packed with antioxidants.
ingredients: 1 tsp green tea leaves or 1 tea bag
procedure: 1. Heat water until it is hot but not boiling.
2. Add green tea leaves and steep for 2-3 minutes.
3. Strain and add honey or lemon if desired.
4. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Ginger Tea
recipes.description: A soothing and spicy tea made with fresh ginger.
procedure: 1. Boil water with sliced ginger for 5 minutes.
2. Add black tea leaves and simmer for 2 minutes.
3. Strain and add honey or milk if desired.
4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Lemon Tea
recipes.description: A refreshing tea with the goodness of lemon and honey.
procedure: 1. Boil water and add black tea leaves.
2. Steep for 2-3 minutes, then strain.
3. Stir in lemon juice and honey.
4. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Peppermint Tea
recipes.description: A calming and minty herbal tea.
ingredients: 1 tbsp fresh peppermint leaves or 1 tea bag
procedure: 1. Boil water and add peppermint leaves.
2. Steep for 5 minutes, then strain.
3. Add honey if desired.
4. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Chamomile Tea
recipes.description: A relaxing herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers.
ingredients: 1 tbsp dried chamomile flowers or 1 tea bag
procedure: 1. Boil water and add chamomile flowers.
2. Steep for 5 minutes, then strain.
3. Add honey if desired.
4. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Tulsi Tea
recipes.description: An immunity-boosting tea made with holy basil leaves.
procedure: 1. Boil water and add tulsi leaves.
2. Steep for 5 minutes, then strain.
3. Add honey if desired.
4. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Jasmine Tea
recipes.description: A fragrant tea infused with jasmine flowers.
procedure: 1. Boil water and add jasmine tea leaves.
2. Steep for 3-4 minutes, then strain.
3. Add honey if desired.
4. Serve warm.

recipes.title: Butter Tea
recipes.description: A traditional Himalayan tea made with butter and salt.
procedure: 1. Boil water and add black tea leaves.
2. Strain and blend with butter and salt until frothy.
3. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Hibiscus Tea
recipes.description: A tangy and vibrant herbal tea made from hibiscus flowers.
procedure: 1. Boil water and add dried hibiscus flowers.
2. Steep for 5 minutes, then strain.
3. Add honey and a slice of lemon.
4. Serve hot or cold.

recipes.title: Vegetable Upma
recipes.description: A light and healthy South Indian breakfast made with semolina, vegetables, and spices.
procedure: 1. Dry roast the semolina until light golden and set aside.
2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds, urad dal, and green chilli.
3. Add chopped vegetables and sauté for 2-3 minutes.
4. Pour in water and bring to a boil.
5. Gradually add semolina while stirring to prevent lumps.
6. Cook until the upma thickens, then garnish with coriander before serving.

recipes.title: Poha
recipes.description: A quick and easy flattened rice dish with onions, peanuts, and spices.
ingredients: Chopped coriander and lemon juice for garnish
procedure: 1. Rinse poha in water and let it sit for 5 minutes.
2. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and green chilli.
3. Add onions and sauté until soft.
4. Stir in potatoes, turmeric powder, and salt.
5. Add poha and mix well. Cook for 2-3 minutes.
6. Garnish with peanuts, coriander, and lemon juice before serving.

recipes.title: Idli with Coconut Chutney
recipes.description: Soft, steamed rice cakes served with a flavorful coconut chutney.
procedure: 1. Pour idli batter into greased idli moulds and steam for 10-12 minutes.
2. Grind coconut, chana dal, green chilli, and ginger with some water to make chutney.
3. Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves, then pour over chutney.
4. Serve hot idlis with coconut chutney.

recipes.title: Masala Dosa
recipes.description: A crispy South Indian pancake filled with spiced potato stuffing.
procedure: 1. Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and green chilli.
2. Add onions, turmeric, and salt, then mix in mashed potatoes.
3. Spread dosa batter thinly on a hot pan and cook until golden.
4. Place potato filling inside and fold the dosa.
5. Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

recipes.title: Aloo Paratha
recipes.description: A stuffed Indian flatbread with spiced mashed potatoes, served with yogurt or pickle.
procedure: 1. Knead wheat flour with water to form a soft dough.
2. Mix mashed potatoes with spices and coriander.
3. Roll out a small dough ball, stuff it with potato filling, and seal.
4. Roll it out again and cook on a hot griddle with ghee.
5. Serve hot with yogurt or pickle.

recipes.title: Classic Belgian Waffles
recipes.description: Crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside, these Belgian waffles are perfect for breakfast.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
4. Mix wet and dry ingredients until just combined.
5. Pour batter into the waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
6. Serve warm with syrup or toppings of choice.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Waffles
recipes.description: Delicious waffles with gooey chocolate chips, perfect for a sweet breakfast or dessert.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
4. Mix wet and dry ingredients until just combined, then fold in chocolate chips.
5. Pour batter into the waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
6. Serve warm with whipped cream or syrup.

recipes.title: Banana Walnut Waffles
recipes.description: Healthy waffles made with mashed bananas and crunchy walnuts.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon.
3. In another bowl, whisk mashed bananas, eggs, milk, and butter.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in walnuts.
5. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
6. Serve warm with honey or maple syrup.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Waffles
recipes.description: A fall-inspired waffle with pumpkin puree and warm spices.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
3. In another bowl, whisk pumpkin puree, eggs, milk, and butter.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients.
5. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
6. Serve warm with whipped cream and maple syrup.

recipes.title: Strawberry Shortcake Waffles
recipes.description: Light and fluffy waffles topped with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients and mix well.
5. Pour batter into the waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
6. Serve with strawberries and whipped cream.

recipes.title: Egg Waffles
recipes.description: Hong Kong-style egg waffles that are crispy on the outside and soft inside.
procedure: 1. Preheat the egg waffle maker and grease it lightly.
2. In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, cornstarch, and sugar.
3. In another bowl, beat eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
4. Mix wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
5. Pour batter into the waffle maker and cook until golden brown.
6. Serve warm with optional toppings.

recipes.title: Savoury Waffles
recipes.description: Cheesy, herbed waffles that pair well with eggs or smoked salmon.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and black pepper.
3. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, butter, and herbs.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in cheese.
5. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until crispy.
6. Serve warm with eggs or smoked salmon.

recipes.title: Potato Waffles
recipes.description: Crispy potato waffles made with mashed potatoes and cheese.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix mashed potatoes, flour, salt, pepper, and cheese.
3. Add beaten egg, milk, and green onions and mix well.
4. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until crispy.
5. Serve with sour cream or ketchup.

recipes.title: Toaster Waffles
recipes.description: Make-ahead toaster waffles that are perfect for a quick breakfast.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In another bowl, whisk eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
4. Combine wet and dry ingredients and mix well.
5. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
6. Let cool, then freeze waffles for future toasting.

recipes.title: Brussels Waffles
recipes.description: Light and airy Brussels-style waffles that are crispy outside and soft inside.
procedure: 1. Preheat waffle iron and grease lightly.
2. Mix flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
3. In another bowl, whisk egg yolks, milk, and melted butter.
4. Beat egg whites separately until stiff peaks form.
5. Combine wet and dry ingredients, then fold in egg whites gently.
6. Pour batter into waffle iron and cook until golden brown.
7. Serve with powdered sugar or fruit toppings.

recipes.title: Classic Grape Wine
recipes.description: A rich and smooth homemade wine made from fresh grapes, fermented to perfection.
procedure: 1. Wash and crush the grapes thoroughly, ensuring the juices are extracted.
2. In a large glass jar or ceramic container, mix the crushed grapes with sugar and water.
3. Add yeast to the mixture and stir well.
4. Cover the container with a muslin cloth and keep it in a dark, warm place.
5. Stir the mixture daily for the first 7 days to aid fermentation.
6. After 3 weeks, strain the liquid through a fine sieve or cloth, discarding the solids.
7. Store the filtered wine in a clean glass bottle and let it mature for at least 3 months before consuming.

recipes.title: Apple Wine
recipes.description: A fragrant and mildly sweet homemade apple wine perfect for any occasion.
procedure: 1. Wash and chop the apples, removing seeds.
2. In a large jar, mix apples, sugar, and water.
3. Add yeast and stir well.
4. Cover with a muslin cloth and let it ferment in a warm, dark place.
5. Stir daily for a week, then let it ferment for 3 weeks.
6. Strain and bottle, allowing it to mature for at least 3 months.

recipes.title: Pineapple Wine
recipes.description: A tropical and tangy homemade pineapple wine with a refreshing taste.
procedure: 1. Peel and chop pineapples, removing the core.
2. Mix pineapple, sugar, and water in a fermentation jar.
3. Add yeast and stir well.
4. Cover with a muslin cloth and let it ferment for 3 weeks.
5. Strain and bottle, allowing it to mature for at least 3 months.

recipes.title: Mango Wine
recipes.description: A smooth and sweet mango wine with a tropical twist.
procedure: 1. Peel and chop mangoes, removing the seed.
2. Mix mango, sugar, and water in a jar.
3. Add yeast and stir well.
4. Cover and ferment for 3 weeks.
5. Strain and bottle, allowing it to mature for at least 3 months.

recipes.title: Strawberry Wine
recipes.description: A fruity and aromatic strawberry wine with a delicate flavour.
procedure: 1. Wash and chop strawberries.
2. Mix strawberries, sugar, and water in a fermentation jar.
3. Add yeast and stir well.
4. Cover and ferment for 3 weeks.
5. Strain and bottle, allowing it to mature for at least 3 months.
